nars.main_nogui

Class NARSBatch

  • java.lang.Object
    • nars.main_nogui.NARSBatch

  • public class NARSBatch
extends java.lang.Object
    The main class of the project.

    Define an application with batch functionality; TODO check duplicated code with NARS

    Manage the internal working thread. Communicate with Reasoner only.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        The entry point of the standalone application.

        Create an instance of the class, then run the init(String[]) and run() methods.

        Parameters:
        args - optional argument used : one input file

        public final void init()
        Initialize the system at the control center.

        Can instantiate multiple reasoners

      • run

        public void run()
        Run to completion: repeatedly execute NARS working cycle, until Inputs are Finished, or 1000 steps. This method is called when the Runnable's thread is started.
